column4: anyone here know networking with virtualbox? nobody seems to be responding on their channel...
you said you were having issues in vbox?
Yes sir, cannot get an xp guest client to see a 2k8 server guest
have you used bridged LAN for both systems?
Tried all the networking options... I can get them to ping but cannot get the xp maching to join the 2k8 server...
if they can ping then your support is in ##windows
oce their is a logical link the issue is windows based
you are doing backups to the same place you have your torrents?
stuff is stored locally, backup runs every night to the firewire
if all you have is nameless data in your backups, I guess not bad at all..
its worked for a good while
